IceStormArena-AggroTill75-FarmTill100-Fa.description: If below level 75, goes to cell r4 of IceStormArena and provokes monsters in cell r3c to farm XP until level 75; make sure to join a public IceStormArena with some level 75+ players. If above level 75, goes to r3c and farms monsters directly for XP, Gold, and Class Points in all classes listed in the "public string[] RankUpClasses = { }" array. Feel free to add Treasure Chests to the "public string[] RequiredItems = { }" array if you would like the script to pick them up, and your desired equipment to the "public string[] EquippedItems = { }" array if you want the bot to equip that gear before farming. Have fun!

VoidHighlord-RoentgeniumOfNulgath.cs.description: Gets you your daily Roentgenium of Nulgath

BloodMoonTokens-VampireLord.cs.description: Farms 300 Blood Moon Tokens required for the Vampire Lord Class.

ChaosMilitiaREP.cs.description: Farms Chaos Militia Reputation up until Rank 10.

ArcangroveREP.cs.description: Farms Arcangrove Reputation up until Rank 10.

HollowbornREP.cs.description: Farms Hollowborn Reputation up until Rank 10.

Dreadrock-LegionTokens.cs.description: Farms your desired quantity of Legion Tokens through the Undead Champion Recruitment Quest in /dreadrock, defaults to max (25,000).

NecroticSword_SmartVoidAuras_UsesBothMet.description: Farms you 7500 Void Auras through Commanding Shadow Essences if you have Sepulchure's DoomKnight Armor, or through Retrieve the Void Auras if you don't. You can edit the RVAQuantity int's value to however many quantities of each item you want to farm per batch of RVA turnins (min = 20, max = 100).

IceStormArena_Aggromon_FastXP.cs.description: Goes to cell r4 of IceStormArena and provokes monsters in cell r3c to farm XP until Level 100; make sure to join a public IceStormArena with some level 75+ players.

TimeForSomeSpringCleaning-LegionTokens.c.description: Farms your desired quantity of Legion Tokens through the Time for Some Spring Cleaning Quest from whichever out of the Shogun Paragon Clones you own, defaults to max (25,000). Accepted Pets: Paragon Fiend Quest Pet, Paragon Ringbearer, Shogun Paragon Pet, Shogun Dage Pet. You can change the amount of Legion Tokens farmed by editing the "public int LegionTokenQuantity" and the amount of each reagent farmed before bulk turning in by editing the "int TurnInQuantity".

SoulSearching-SpiritOrbs-BLoD-Part1.cs.description: Farms you 10500 Spirit Orbs through the Soul Searching Quest.

APennyForYourFoughts-DarkSpiritOrbs-SDKA.description: Farms you 10500 Dark Spirit Orbs through the A Penny For Your Foughts Quest.

Hollowborn-ShadowReapers-Scythe.cs.description: Farms you the Hollowborn ShadowReaper's Scythe. You may buy back the Incarnation of Glitches Scythe if you can.

NNg_Ancient_Astrolabe_and_ancient_hourgl.description: This bot will grind for Ancient Astrolabe and Ancient Hourglass with customisable quantity set, toggle buttons and all Lightning set drops in order to merge (REQUIREMENTS: MUST FINISH ORBHUNT IADOA'S QUESTLINE IN ORDER TO LAUNCH THE SCRIPT)
